description:
I used to be able to pass through generic nosetests options to ./run_tests.sh, now I can't and the script fails silently.


markw@elodin:nova$ vi nova/testing/runner.py 
markw@elodin:nova$ ./run_tests.sh --with-xunit
markw@elodin:nova$ echo $?
2
markw@elodin:nova$ tail -20 run_tests.log 
Usage: runner.py [options]

runner.py: error: no such option: --with-xunit
title: nova broken nose
